title: Watch all the performances from the 2019 Polaris Music Prize gala | CBC Music
text:
The 2019 Polaris Music Prize gala has come to an end, but you can relive all the great performances here on CBC Music.

Nine of this year's shortlisted acts — Pup, Shad, Elisapie, Les Louanges, Marie Davidson, Snotty Nose Rez Kids, Fet.Nat, Dominique Fils-Aimé and this year's winner, Haviah Mighty — took to the stage to perform cuts from their nominated albums. Watch all the performances below, and head over to cbcmusic.ca/polaris for full coverage of this year's event.

Pup performing 'Kids,' 'Free at Last' and 'Full Blown Meltdown'

PUP performs “Kids”, “Free At Last” and “Full Blow Meltdown” at the 2019 Polaris Music Prize Gala. 7:43

Marie Davidson performing 'Work It'

Marie Davidson performs “Work It” at the 2019 Polaris Music Prize Gala. 6:22

Shad performing 'The Fool, Pt. 1' and 'Magic' featuring Lido Pimienta

Shad performs “The Fool pt. 1” and “Magic” featuring Lido Pimienta at the 2019 Polaris Music Prize Gala. 6:23

Elisapie performing 'Darkness Bring the Light' and 'Amaq'

Elisapie performs “Darkness Bring the Light” and “Arnaq” at the 2019 Polaris Music Prize Gala. 9:10

Haviah Mighty performing a medley from her album, 13th Floor

Haviah Mighty performs a medley featuring tracks from 13th Floor at the 2019 Polaris Music Prize Gala. 8:24

Les Louanges performing 'La nuit est une panthère' and 'Tercel'

Les Louanges perform “La nuit est une panthère” and “Tercel” at the 2019 Polaris Music Prize Gala. 8:05

Dominique Fils-Aimé performing 'Gun Burial' and 'Free Dom'

Dominique Fils-Aimé performs “Gun Burial” and “Free Dom” at the 2019 Polaris Music Prize Gala. 8:44

Fet.Nat performing 'Trust Cops (medley)'

FET.NAT perform "Trust Cops (medley)" at the 2019 Polaris Music Prize gala. 8:26

Snotty Nose Rez Kids performing 'Wa'wais (medley)'
description: Nine of this year's 10 nominees took the stage, including Pup, Marie Davidson and Shad.
